title: Akuma De Kore Wa Koi Janai!
alternative_title: アクマでこれは恋じゃない！ ; Akuma de Kore wa Koi janai! ; This Isn't Demon Love at All!
status: アクマでこれは恋じゃない！ ; Akuma de Kore wa Koi janai! ; This Isn't Demon Love at All!
description:
Description :
        Aguri, is a young girl who is a demon apprentice. She comes to the human world after her teacher assigned her "to make a human fall in love with her". She thinks it will be easy since she is quite famous in the demons' world, but her target, Kyou-kun, is much better than her...
